strings.language.subtitle: Anyị nwere ike ịchọpụta na akpaghị aka dabere na mpaghara gị.
strings.language.manual: Ma ọ bụ jiri aka gị họrọ

strings.setup.title: Nhazi
strings.setup.note: Wụnye ndabere dev site na oru ngo wee malite ngwa dev. Nke a dị mkpa naanị ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-agba ọsọ site na isi iyi.
strings.mode.title: Ụdị ule
strings.extras.title: Mgbakwunye
strings.progress.title: Nchọpụta nchọpụta na-agba ọsọ...
strings.results.title: Nsonaazụ
strings.export.title: Mbup��� nsonaazụ
strings.suggestions.title: Ntụnye nkwalite
strings.suggestions.placeholder: Gbaa nyocha nyocha ka ịhụ ntụnye.
strings.modal.title: Mbupụ nsonaazụ
strings.modal.subtitle: Họrọ usoro:
strings.results.brief.title: Nchịkọta dị nkenke
strings.results.extensive.title: Nnyocha nyocha sara mbara
strings.label.name: aha
strings.note.noIssues: Ọnweghị nsogbu ahụrụ ozugbo. Sistemu na-adị ka ahụike.
strings.suggest.checklist.brief: Malite ndepụta nlele ọrụ: gosi na etinyere ngwaọrụ ndị dị mkpa ma wuo na-agba ọsọ.
strings.suggest.checklist.extensive: Ndepụta arụmọrụ kacha elu: gbado anya na usoro na-emezi ọsọ na arụmọrụ.
strings.suggest.memory.low: Ebe nchekwa dị ala: mechie ngwa ejighi ya ma ọ bụ malitegharịa ka RAM efu.
strings.suggest.memory.veryHigh: Iji RAM> = 90%: mechie ngwa dị arọ, kwụsịtụ na-ewuli, ma ọ bụ na-abawanye sistemụ RAM.
strings.suggest.memory.high: Iji RAM> = 80%: tụlee imechi ngwa ma ọ bụ ịbawanye RAM ma ọ bụrụ na nke a na-emekarị.
strings.suggest.memory.reserve: Debe RAM 20% efu maka cache na ọrụ OS; 10% bụ opekempe iji zere iji nwayọ nwayọ.
strings.suggest.cpu.high: Ibu CPU dị elu: lelee Task Manager maka usoro dị arọ.
strings.suggest.internet.failed: Nyocha ịntanetị dara: nyochaa njikọ gị ma ọ bụ firewall.
strings.suggest.internet.latency: Latency ịntanetị dị elu: nwaa ịgbanwee netwọkụ ma ọ bụ malitegharịa rawụta ahụ.
strings.suggest.os.updates: MacOS mmelite dị: wụnye mmelite kachasị ọhụrụ.
strings.suggest.gpu.full: Gbaa nyocha nyocha zuru oke iji tinye _TOK_4__ wee hazie nkọwapụta.
strings.suggest.ide.cap: Achọpụtara okpu JetBrains IDE: mụbaa IDE nha mkpokọta ma ọ bụrụ na arụmọrụ adịghị nwayọ.
strings.suggest.wifi.weak: Mgbama Wi-Fi adịghị ike (<60%): gaa nso na rawụta ma ọ bụ gbanwee gaa na Ethernet.
strings.suggest.wifi.weakRssi: Mgbama Wi-Fi adịghị ike (RSI dị ala): gaa nso na rawụta ma ọ bụ gbanwee gaa na Ethernet.
strings.suggest.power.plan: Edokwaghị atụmatụ ike ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị elu: gbanwee gaa na arụmọrụ kacha mma / dị elu mgbe ị na-etinye koodu ma ọ bụ na-ewu ụlọ.
strings.suggest.vscode.extensions: _TOK_12__: gbanyụọ ndọtị na-ejighị ya wee wepu nchekwa nrụpụta/ mmepụta na ikiri faịlụ na ịchọ.
strings.suggest.jetbrains.tune: JetBrains IDEs: gbanyụọ plugins ejighi ya, wepuo ihe nrụpụta site na ntinye aha, wee bulite nha nke ikpo okwu ma ọ dị mkpa.
strings.suggest.vs.parallel: Visual Studio: mee ka oru ngo na-arụkọ ọrụ wulite ma budata ọrụ ndị a na-ejighị ya iji belata oge ibu ihe ngwọta.
strings.suggest.xcode.derived: Xcode: hichaa DerivedData mgbe ị na-edepụta ma ọ bụ na-ewuli oge.
strings.suggest.android.accel: _TOK_15__: mee ka emulator ngwa ngwa ngwa ma debe cache Gradle na nchekwa ngwa ngwa.
strings.suggest.node.lts: _TOK_10__: jiri ntọhapụ LTS kachasị ọhụrụ wee debe ndabere ọrụ na nchekwa SSD.
strings.suggest.ts.incremental: TypeScript: mee ka nrụpụta abawanye ma ọ bụ ntụnye aka maka nnukwu codebases.
strings.suggest.python.venv: Python: jiri mebere gburugburu iji dobe nrụnye dịpụrụ adịpụ yana ngwa ngwa.
strings.suggest.java.lts: Java: jiri LTS JDK dị ugbu a wee mee ka cache wuo (Gradle/Maven) maka wughachi ngwa ngwa.
strings.suggest.docker.windows: _TOK_18__ Desktọpụ (Windows): jiri WSL2 azụ azụ wee gee CPU/ RAM oke maka ibu ọrụ gị.
strings.suggest.docker.mac: _TOK_18__ Desktọpụ (macOS): kpatụ CPU/ RAM oke na nkesa faịlụ (VirtioFS ma ọ dị).
strings.checklist.osDrivers: Melite OS yana ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala ngwaọrụ (GPU, chipset, Wi-Fi/LAN) gaa na ụdị kwụsiri ike kachasị ọhụr��.
strings.checklist.powerPlan: Jiri atụmatụ ike dị elu/arụmọrụ kacha mma mgbe ị na-etinye koodu ma ọ bụ na-ewu ụlọ.
strings.checklist.startupApps: Gbanyụọ ma ọ bụ gbutuo ngwa mmalite na ọrụ ndabere ị naghị eji.
strings.checklist.diskSpace: Debe opekata mpe 20% ohere diski efu; mee diski diski ma wepụ nnukwu faịlụ temp.
strings.checklist.ssd: Na-ahọrọ nchekwa SSD maka oru ngo; zere ibu arọ na-ewuli na ngwa ngwa mpụga draịva.
strings.checklist.visualEffects: Belata nsonaazụ anya/animation maka snappier UI.
strings.checklist.antivirus: Wepụ nchekwa nchekwa ọrụ (node_modules, wuo, dist) na nyocha antivirus ozugbo.
strings.checklist.wifi: Jiri Ethernet ma ọ bụ ike 5GHz Wi-Fi; melite rawụta firmware na reboot kwa oge.
strings.checklist.dns: Tọọ DNS ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eweta ngwa ngwa wee chọpụta na ọ dị obere maka nbudata ngwugwu.
strings.checklist.browser: Machie taabụ nchọgharị wee mechie ngwa dị arọ n'oge a na-ewuli elu.
strings.checklist.hwAccel: Kwado ngwa ngwa ngwaike ebe akwadoro (ihe nchọgharị/IDE).
strings.checklist.cliTools: Debe ngwaọrụ CLI ka ọ dị ọhụrụ (Node.js, npm, Git, Docker, Java).
strings.checklist.reboot: Malitegharịa ekwentị ka emelitere isi ka ihichapụ usoro na mgbachi kwụ ọtọ.
strings.note.speedtest.unavailable: Ọ nweghị isi mmalite kacha ọsọ azara.
strings.note.speedtest.singleSource: Nsonaazụ dabere na otu isi mmalite.
strings.note.speedtest.captive: Achọpụtara ọnụ ụzọ mbata n'agha; egbochiri ọsọ ọsọ.
